Package gov.usgs.anss.edgethread

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EdgeThreadInterface
    This interface establishes the minimum requred to be an edgethread.
    ManagerInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EdgeThread
    This sets up the required /commonn stuff for a EdgeMom controlled Thread class.
    EdgeThreadTemplate
    This is a template for an EdgeThread (one that can be run by EdgeMom.
    EdgeThreadTimeout
    Class is a time out thread which can be set up with some other thread to cause it to be interrupted() after some interval and destroy() after some longer interval.
    FakeThread
    This sets up a faked up edgethead so that logging can be used from test routines that do not need to have a real EdgeThread.
    MemoryChecker
    This thread monitors memory and periodically prints a status line.
    MonitorServer
    This server sends a string of Key-Value pairs with monitoring information on the process.
